creator: jsalvata@atg.com
text:
It would be nice if the Restart button were more visible when enabled. Red font
or blink would be appropriate -- otherwise the unfamiliar user may have problems
to find out that he needs to press it.

But we need to fix #25143 before doing that.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
For some changes, it might be possible to implement them without needing to run 
restart.

For the others, one could add a pop-up message box to warn the user?

Otherwise, how about making the button invisible when disabled?

creator: sebb@apache.org
text: Restart does change when it is needed
